main event: A possible UFO sighting reported by a co-pilot during a training flight over Meridian, Mississippi on 8 May 1961.
interesting points: The object was reported to have a brightness between a second and third magnitude star., The object was observed at approximately 32 degrees elevation before disappearing below the horizon., There were no weather balloons in the area at the time of the sighting according to local weather station queries., The USAF considered the case as possibly involving a satellite but ultimately left it as unidentified., The aircraft commander confirmed that the co-pilot had observed the object during the flight.
witness description: co-pilot and aircraft commander during a training flight
